name: MUC_022
description:
Live an amazing adventure among the microscopic components of your home motherboard!

You are an Orb, one of the many microscopic, invisible and peaceful creatures that live in all of our electrical components. The adventure starts when a Surge enters the system, damaging all the microchips that the Orbs use as homes. In the span of a few picoseconds, everything will be destroyed if you don't act now!

Interact with multiple characters and electrical components to redirect the Surge away from the microchips, in this real-time adventure puzzle game!

This game was entirely made in 4 days, for the first edition of Taboulé Game Jam, including:

  • All gameplay mechanics
  • All graphics
  • All musics

The only assets made before the game jam are the logo splashscreen at the beginning and a few minor technical functions.

Tools:
  • Game engine: Unity
  • 3D art: Blender
  • Palettes: GraphicsGale
  • UI art: Adobe Illustrator
  • Music: FL Studio
Changelog v1.0
  • Game release at the end of Taboulé Game Jam.
v1.1
  • Fix a bug about Orb grabbing
